  • Method Details

    • loadDataPack

      DataPack loadDataPack​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Loads the passed player's data pack. If not found, a new data pack module is created. (CAN RETURN NULL)
      Parameters:
      player - The player to load the data pack for.

    • loadAllDataPacks

      void loadAllDataPacks()
      Loads the all player data packs.

    • getShopRayTraced

      Shop getShopRayTraced​(String worldName, org.bukkit.util.Vector eyeVector, org.bukkit.util.Vector directionVector, double distance)
      Ray traces from the provided vectors to obtain a shop from the locations it passes through.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The world to ray trace in.
      eyeVector - The eye location of the entity or just the general origin location.
      directionVector - The direction at which the vector should go.
      distance - The distance at which the ray should travel.
      Returns:
      The found shop, returns NULL if NOT found.

    • initiateShopEconomyTransaction

      EconomyCallEvent initiateShopEconomyTransaction​(org.bukkit.entity.Player investor, org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer producer, Shop shop, EconomyCallType economyCallType, double price)
      Initiates a withdraw/deposit transaction directed at an investor and owner automating messages, taxing, and more (The stopInTacks() method must be called still).
      Parameters:
      investor - The buyer.
      producer - The seller.
      shop - The shop in use.
      economyCallType - The economy type being processed Buy, Sell, etc.
      price - The price in use.
      Returns:
      the economy call event

    • initiateChatInteractionOperation

      boolean initiateChatInteractionOperation​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, ChatInteractionType chatInteractionType, String playerEntryValue)
      Runs the chat interaction operation as normal using the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      player - The player of who is in the chat interaction.
      playerEntryValue - The value/message the player entered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the interaction completes successfully; otherwise, the return is false.

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String message)
      Sends a color translated message to the players as either a normal chat message or action bar message.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to send the message to.
      message - The message to send (color codes accepted, if the message contains {bar} at the front it will be sent to the action bar).

    • getInventorySpaceForItem

      int getInventorySpaceForItem​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Obtains available space for a defined item.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's inventory needs to be checked.
      itemStack - The itemstack to check for.
      Returns:
      The total available item amount space.

    • getMarketRegion

      MarketRegion getMarketRegion​(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Retrieve a market region, if the passed location is inside it.
      Parameters:
      location - The location to check.
      Returns:
      The MarketRegion object found.

    • getMarketRegion

      MarketRegion getMarketRegion​(String marketId)
      Retrieve a market region by Id, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      marketId - The id to check for.
      Returns:
      The MarketRegion object.

    • doesMarketRegionExist

      boolean doesMarketRegionExist​(String marketId)
      Checks if a market region already exists with the passed id.
      Parameters:
      marketId - The id to check.
      Returns:
      The result as a boolean value.

    • isTooClose

      boolean isTooClose​(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Gets if a location is too close to a shop based on the distance value in the configuration.
      Parameters:
      location - The location to check around.
      Returns:
      The result as a boolean.

    • getItemName

      String getItemName​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Gets the name of the item. If the item name is not custom, then either the original or translated name will be used.
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The item to get the name of.
      Returns:
      The item name.

      Returns:
      The translated version.

      Double[] getBaseBlockOffsets​(Shop shop)

    • createShop

      Shop createShop​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.block.Block block, int shopItemAmount, boolean doCreationEffects, boolean sendCreationMessage)
      Creates a shop at the passed block owned by the passed player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to use as the owner.
      block - The block to create the shop at.
      shopItemAmount - The amount used for the shop item.
      doCreationEffects - Whether to play the effects and sounds.
      sendCreationMessage - Whether to send the creation message.
      Returns:
      The shop object.

    • loadShops

      void loadShops​(boolean isAsync, String tableName)
      Attempts to load all available shops from the database.
      Parameters:
      isAsync - Whether the task is ran on the main thread.
      tableName - The table where the data is located in the database.

    • getMaxStock

      int getMaxStock​(Shop shop)
      Obtains the passed shop's max stock based on owner permissions or administrator bypasses.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to get the max stock for (obtains owner for permissions, returns max possible integer if the shop is admin or the owner has the "displayshops.stock.max").
      Returns:
      The obtained max stock (defaults to configuration value or max possible integer, if the shop is admin).

    • getPromotionPriceModifier

      double getPromotionPriceModifier​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Gets the player specific shop promotion item modifier.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      The modifier for multiplication.

    • giveItemStacks

      void giveItemStacks​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStackToClone, int amount)
      Gives the passed item stack to the player the passed amount of times in the form of stacks.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to give the items to (drops at feet if inventory is full).
      itemStackToClone - The item stack to make the stacks from.
      amount - The amount of the items to give to the player (NOT stacks).

    • removeItem

      boolean removeItem​(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack, int amount)
      Remove a certain amount of a certain similar item.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory to remove from.
      itemStack - The item to check for.
      amount - The amount to remove.
      Returns:
      Whether an item was removed or not.

    • getItemAmount

      int getItemAmount​(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Get amount of similar items.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory to check.
      itemStack - The item to check for.
      Returns:
      The total amount.

    • isSimilar

      boolean isSimilar​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemOne, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemTwo)
      Checks if two items are identical using string format.
      Parameters:
      itemOne - The first item.
      itemTwo - The second item.
      Returns:
      Whether the items are identical.

      boolean isNotNumeric​(String string)
      See if a string is NOT a numerical value.
      Parameters:
      string - The string to check.
      Returns:
      Whether it is numerical or not.

    • wrapString

      List<String> wrapString​(String text, int wordLineLimit)
      Wraps a string into multiple lines based on a word count.
      Parameters:
      text - The long string to wrap.
      wordLineLimit - The line size in terms of word count.
      Returns:
      wraps the string to multiple lines

    • buildShopCreationItem

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack buildShopCreationItem​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int amount)
      Builds and returns the shop creation item.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check for what base-block to use.
      amount - The amount of the item stack.
      Returns:
      The shop creation physical item stack.

    • buildShopCurrencyItem

      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack buildShopCurrencyItem​(int amount)
      Builds and returns the shop currency item.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of the item stack.
      Returns:
      The shop currency physical item stack.

    • getBaseBlockSelectionMenu

      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getBaseBlockSelectionMenu​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, Shop shop)
      Gets the base-block selection GUI and calculates the player's access, current shop base-block, etc.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to use for permission basing.
      shop - The shop to use to get information from.
      Returns:
      The complete GUI.

    • buildShopEditMenu

      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory buildShopEditMenu​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Builds and sets the shop edit menu from the configuration to the variable.
      Parameters:
      player - The player the edit menu needs to be built for.
      Returns:
      The built inventory.

    • buildTransactionMenu

      org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory buildTransactionMenu​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, Shop shop)
      Builds and sets the shop transaction menu from the configuration to the variable.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to personalize the menu for.
      shop - The shop the interactions should be made for.

    • updateTransactionMenu

      void updateTransactionMenu​(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, Shop shop, int unitCount)
      Updates the transaction gui with live information.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory to update.
      shop - The shop to use the information from.

    • isBlockedWorld

      boolean isBlockedWorld​(org.bukkit.World world)
      Checks if the passed world is in the world blacklist.
      Parameters:
      world - The world to check for.
      Returns:
      Whether the world is blocked or not.

    • getCurrencyBalance

      double getCurrencyBalance​(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, Shop shop, boolean useVault)
      Obtains the currency balance of the passed player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to get the balance of.
      shop - The shop to get the trade-item from.
      useVault - Whether or not to use Vault methods.
      Returns:
      The found player balance amount.
